title: Fly the W Plugin Configuration
description: Configuration for the Chicago Cubs Fly the W celebration plugin

display_duration.description: How long (in seconds) to show the plugin per rotation slot while celebrating

update_interval.description: How often (in seconds) to poll the ESPN MLB scoreboard for a Cubs win

celebration_hours.description: How many hours to display the W flag after a Cubs win (default 1 hour)

animation_fps.description: Target frames per second for the waving flag animation

show_score.description: Overlay the final score on the display

show_text.description: Show 'CUBS WIN!' text alongside the flag

font_name.description: Font file to use for text overlays (from assets/fonts directory)

live_priority.description: When true, the plugin takes over the display immediately after a Cubs win instead of waiting for its normal rotation slot

transition.description: Transition settings when entering/leaving this plugin

simulate_win.description: Simulate a Cubs win for testing â€” activates the celebration immediately without waiting for a real game. Set back to false to cancel.

vegas_mode.description: How this plugin appears in Vegas scroll mode. 'static' pauses the scroll while the flag displays (recommended). 'fixed' scrolls the flag by as a block.
